events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their sedan and a delivery truck at a busy intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description and keywords detected.
A claims agent specializing in auto accidents has been assigned to handle the case and contact the claimant.
The claimant has been sent an official acknowledgment notice confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
Request sent to the claimant for accident report, photographs of the damaged vehicle, and police report.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including police report, photos, and repair estimates promptly.
Claims team has begun investigation into the accident circumstances and liability assessment.
Investigation confirms liability of the other driver in the collision after reviewing all evidence.
A fair settlement amount covering damages and medical expenses was proposed to the claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the prompt processing and the proposed settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved for the proposed settlement amount without any pending conditions.
Payment was disbursed to the claimant's bank account covering all approved damages and expenses.
The claim was closed after payment processing and confirmation of claimant satisfaction.
The complete case file has been archived in the system for future reference and audit purposes.
